title: Crime Alert 11.28.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.28.18
description:
Suspect in Tara Grinstead murder in court. Stepdad kills daughter during school break. US officials to release information on Paul Manafort after they say he broke plea deal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
